body_html: Too bad that cuDNN doesn't support zero-strides, but manually forcing contiguous will probably be fine. As a quick back-of-the-envelope, Faster R-CNN with VGG16 will take feature maps roughly of shape 512 x 18 x 25 for each image and produce 300 crops for each input image; expanding the features to 300 x 512 x 18 x 25 is about 264MB. Not ideal but should still be workable.
